scripts.build:choose: echo 'Which service would you like to build?' && select choice in 'Main App' 'Admin App' 'Backend' 'SDK' 'UI' 'Program'; do case $choice in 'Main App') pnpm build:main; break;; 'Admin App') pnpm build:admin; break;; 'Backend') pnpm build:backend; break;; 'SDK') pnpm build:sdk; break;; 'UI') pnpm build:ui; break;; 'Program') pnpm build:program; break;; *) echo 'Invalid choice, try again.';; esac; done
scripts.dev:choose: echo 'Which service would you like to run?' && select choice in 'Main App (Port 3000)' 'Admin App (Port 3001)' 'Backend (Port 4000)' 'SDK' 'UI'; do case $choice in 'Main App (Port 3000)') pnpm dev:main; break;; 'Admin App (Port 3001)') pnpm dev:admin; break;; 'Backend (Port 4000)') pnpm dev:backend; break;; 'SDK') pnpm dev:sdk; break;; 'UI') pnpm dev:ui; break;; *) echo 'Invalid choice, try again.';; esac; done
scripts.lint:choose: echo 'Which service would you like to lint?' && select choice in 'Main App' 'Admin App' 'Backend' 'SDK' 'UI' 'Program'; do case $choice in 'Main App') pnpm lint:main; break;; 'Admin App') pnpm lint:admin; break;; 'Backend') pnpm lint:backend; break;; 'SDK') pnpm lint:sdk; break;; 'UI') pnpm lint:ui; break;; 'Program') pnpm lint:program; break;; *) echo 'Invalid choice, try again.';; esac; done
